00060   void
00061   processOptions(const TMS_Data::ListJobsOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00062 
00063     //To check if the jobId is defined
00064     if (options->getJobId().size() != 0) {
00065       //To check if the jobIf exists
00066       checkJobId(options->getJobId());
00067       //To add the jobId on the request
00068       addOptionRequest("jobId", options->getJobId(), sqlRequest);
00069     }
00070 
00071     //To check if the number of cpu is defined and positive
00072     if (options->getNbCpu() > 0) {
00073       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00074       addOptionRequest("nbCpus", convertToString(options->getNbCpu()), sqlRequest);
00075     } else {
00076       //If the options is not the default value -1
00077       if (options->getNbCpu() != -1) {
00078         throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "The number of cpu is incorrect");
00079       }
00080     }
00081 
00082     time_t fromSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getFromSubmitDate());
00083     if(fromSubmitDate != -1) {
00084       fromSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(fromSubmitDate);
00085       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(fromSubmitDate));
00086       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00087     }
00088 
00089     time_t toSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getToSubmitDate());
00090     if(toSubmitDate != -1) {
00091       toSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(toSubmitDate); 
00092       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(toSubmitDate));
00093       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00094     }
00095 
00096     //To check the job status
00097     if (options->getStatus() != -1) {
00098       //To check the job status options
00099       checkJobStatus(options->getStatus());
00100       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00101       addOptionRequest("status", convertToString(options->getStatus()), sqlRequest);
00102     } else {
00103        if (options->getJobId().empty() && options->getMultipleStatus().empty()) { 
00104          sqlRequest.append(" and status < 5 "); 
00105        } 
00106     }
00107 
00108     if(!options->getMultipleStatus().empty()) {
00109       bool error = false;
00110       string invalidState;
00111       std::string multStat = options->getMultipleStatus();
00112       std::string::iterator iter;
00113       std::string::iterator beg = multStat.begin();
00114       std::string::iterator end = multStat.end();
00115       std::vector<std::string> vec;
00116       for(iter=beg; iter!=end; ++iter) {
00117         switch(*iter) {
00118           case 'S':case '1':
00119             vec.push_back("status=1");
00120             break;
00121           case 'Q':case '2':
00122             vec.push_back("status=2");
00123             break;
00124           case 'W':case '3':
00125             vec.push_back("status=3");
00126             break;
00127           case 'R':case '4':
00128             vec.push_back("status=4");
00129             break;
00130           case 'T':case '5':
00131             vec.push_back("status=5");
00132             break;
00133           case 'C':case '6':
00134             vec.push_back("status=6");
00135             break;
00136           case 'D':case '7':
00137             vec.push_back("status=7");
00138             break;
00139           default:
00140             error = true;
00141             invalidState = *iter;
00142             break;
00143         }
00144 
00145         if(error) {
00146           throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, invalidState+" is an invalid state.");
00147         }
00148       }
00149       std::vector<std::string>::iterator vec_iter;
00150       if(!vec.empty()){
00151         sqlRequest.append(" and ("+*vec.begin());
00152         for(vec_iter=vec.begin()+1; vec_iter!=vec.end(); ++vec_iter) {
00153 
00154           sqlRequest.append(" or "+*vec_iter);
00155         }
00156         sqlRequest.append(")");
00157       }
00158     }
00159 
00160     //To check the job priority
00161     if (options->getPriority() != -1) {
00162       //To check the job priority options
00163       checkJobPriority(options->getPriority());
00164       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00165       addOptionRequest("jobPrio", convertToString(options->getPriority()), sqlRequest);
00166     }
00167 
00168     if (options->getOwner().size() != 0) {
00169       addOptionRequest("owner", options->getOwner(), sqlRequest);
00170     }
00171 
00172     //To check if the queue is defined
00173     if (options->getQueue().size() != 0) {
00174       BatchFactory factory;
00175       BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType();
00176       boost::scoped_ptr<BatchServer> batchServer(factory.getBatchServerInstance(batchType));
00177       batchServer->listQueues(options->getQueue()); //raise an exception if options->getQueue does not exist
00178  
00179       addOptionRequest("jobQueue", options->getQueue(), sqlRequest);
00180     }
00181   }

00189   list() {

00200 
00201     bool allOptionsAreNotSet = (mparameters->getNbCpu()<=0);

00203     allOptionsAreNotSet = allOptionsAreNotSet && (mparameters->getToSubmitDate()==-1);

00209 
00210     if(mparameters->isBatchJob() && !allOptionsAreNotSet) {
00211      throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "Conflict: the batchJob option is incompatible with other options excepted jobId option.");
00212     }
00213 
00214     if(mparameters->isBatchJob() && mmachineId.compare(LIST_JOBS_ON_MACHINES_KEYWORD)==0) {
00215      throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "Conflict: the batchJob option is incompatible with machine id equal to all.");

00240         results.clear();

00242         ii = results.begin();
00243 
00244         TMS_Data::Job_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createJob();

00246         job->setSessionId(*ii);
00247         job->setSubmitMachineId(*(++ii));

00249         job->setJobId(*(++ii));

00258         if(jobStatus==4) {
00259           nbRunningJobs++;
00260         } else if(jobStatus >= 1 && jobStatus <= 3) {
00261           nbWaitingJobs++;
00262         }
00263         job->setStatus(jobStatus);
00264         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00265         submitDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));

00267         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00268         endDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00269         job->setEndDate(endDate);
00270         job->setOwner(*(++ii));
00271         job->setJobQueue(*(++ii));
00272         job->setWallClockLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00273         job->setGroupName(*(++ii));
00274         job->setJobDescription(*(++ii));
00275         job->setMemLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00276         job->setNbNodes(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00277         job->setNbNodesAndCpuPerNode(*(++ii)); 
00278         
00279         batchJobId = *(++ii);
00280         job->setBatchJobId(batchJobId);
00281         ignoredIds.push_back(batchJobId);
00282 
00283         mlistObject->getJobs().push_back(job);
00284       }
00285       mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getJobs().size());
00286       mlistObject->setNbRunningJobs(nbRunningJobs);
00287       mlistObject->setNbWaitingJobs(nbWaitingJobs);
00288     } 
00289  
00290     if(mparameters->isBatchJob() && !mparameters->getJobId().empty() && mmachineId.compare(LIST_JOBS_ON_MACHINES_KEYWORD)!=0){
00291       BatchFactory factory;
00292       BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType();
00293       boost::scoped_ptr<BatchServer> batchServer(factory.getBatchServerInstance(batchType));
00294 
00295       if(mlistObject != NULL) {
00296         std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = ignoredIds.begin();
00297         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mlistObject->getJobs().size(); i++) {
00298           if(iter!=ignoredIds.end()){
00299             (mlistObject->getJobs().get(i))->setJobId(*iter);
00300             int state = batchServer->getJobState(*iter);
00301             ++iter;
00302             if(state!=-1 && (mlistObject->getJobs().get(i))->getStatus()!=5 &&
00303                 (mlistObject->getJobs().get(i))->getStatus()!=6 &&
00304                 (mlistObject->getJobs().get(i))->getStatus()!=7) {
00305               (mlistObject->getJobs().get(i))->setStatus(state);
00306             }
00307           }
00308         }
00309       }
00310       return mlistObject;
00311     }
00312 
00313     if(mparameters->isBatchJob() && mmachineId.compare(LIST_JOBS_ON_MACHINES_KEYWORD)!=0 && allOptionsAreNotSet){
00314       BatchFactory factory;
00315       BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType();

00317 
00318       batchServer->fillListOfJobs(mlistObject, ignoredIds);

00320 
00321     return mlistObject;
